features: Cool & Hands-Free Design: The neck fan is designed with 78 air vents, it can provide cooling airflow for your entire face. Stay cool and comfortable all summer long, no matter where you go. The headphone design, free your hands.
Safety & Low Noise: Enjoy peace of mind with the bladeless design, which is safe for the elderly and children to use. Plus, the slope wind infusion structure makes it gentle and quiet.

USB Charge & 3 Speeds: The personal fan is equipped with a 4000mAh high-capacity battery which is charged via USB and works continuously for 3-16 hours after a full charge (depending on the gear used). You can adjust the neck fan speed by pressing the power button repeatedly.
Comfortable & High Ductility: The wearable neck fan is made of environmentally friendly ABS silicone material, which is comfortable to wear and won't slip or break easily.

Portable & Practical: Our portable neck fan is lightweight and practical, making it perfect for home, sports, hiking, walking, and travel. It also makes a great gift for parents, children, and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best 20 dollars ive spent in years
reviews.reviewText: Best 20 dollars ive spent in years. works great for hot flashes, etc.Update: I just got back from a 2 week mission trip to Africa. It was 95 degrees and humid and this fan was a God-send. I absolutely LOVE it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m a football mom and needed something to keep me cool with outside at the games. This was by far the best one. I love that it had multiple speed ranges and actually blew air. For the most part it kept me up. The only I recommend is to always make sure you are charging it because it will go dead after a few hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Staying Cool Anywhere!
reviews.reviewText: The design of this fan is a game-changer. Worn like a headphone, it's comfortable and fits securely around your neck, allowing you to move freely while staying cool. The bladeless technology is not only safe but also incredibly efficient at delivering a refreshing breeze. No more worrying about my hair getting caught in traditional fan blades!The three adjustable speeds are a fantastic feature. Whether I need a gentle breeze or a powerful blast of cool air, this fan has me covered. The rechargeable battery is a huge plus, ensuring I can enjoy hours of cooling without constantly changing batteries.The TOAOB Portable Neck Fan is impressively quiet, which is ideal for both personal use and public settings. I've worn it on walks, hikes, outdoor events, and even while working at my desk. It's discreet and doesn't disrupt conversations or activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It does cool your neck & therefore your pulse points, so it was a great purchase. I just wish it came with a DC adapter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Highly recommend buying this if you get hot easily or are in a hot environment! It works great w/3 different speeds! It's not too loud & it's comfortable so recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: While it does it’s job keeping you cool. I highly recommend for an outdoor concert where the blowing sound may not be as annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A pleasant surprise in the summer heat
reviews.reviewText: I brought the Portable Neck Fan on our summer trip to Japan, much to my boyfriend's skepticism. He doubted its effectiveness, but it quickly became a favorite accessory for both of us. With the intense heat and humidity, this fan provided an immediate cooling effect, proving its worth time and time again. Lightweight and easy to use, it was a relief to have during our outdoor adventures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have when working in a hot environment
reviews.reviewText: Best portable device to have especially working near or on machinery. Even though my workplace has air conditioning, it’s so difficult to get any kind of cool air circulating at my workplace. This device is a godsend; I sweat easily and this device keeps me cool. There’s three settings for fan speed (L-M-H). I set it to (M) to conserve battery.I normally work around my machine area less than six hours a day and this has enough juice to keep it going. I highly recommend this product.Pros: quite fan Good battery life LightweightCons: none so far
